results.title:
Radio Rythm, No. A9-1-2A
Vitaphone record
results.brief_description: Vitaphone was a sound film system used for feature films and nearly 1,000 short subjects made by Warner Bros. and its sister studio First National from 1926 to 1931. Vitaphone was the last major analog sound-on-disc system and the only one which was widely used and commercially successful.

results.title: Charles Hackett, 392 Reel Three Vitaphone record
results.brief_description:
Reel three of a short film about tenor singer Charles Hackett.

Vitaphone was a sound film system used for feature films and nearly 1,000 short subjects made by Warner Bros. and its sister studio First National from 1926 to 1931. Vitaphone was the last major analog sound-on-disc system and the only one which was widely used and commercially successful.

results.title: The Ghost Breakers cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This black and white slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Ghost Breakers’ featuring Bob Hope and Paulette Goddard distributed by Paramount Pictures. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to all edges of the image. “THU FRI SAT” has been scratched in to the lower edge of the glass.

results.title: Slightly Dangerous cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Slightly Dangerous’ featuring Lana Turner and Robert Young distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

results.title: The Girls He Left Behind cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Girls He Left Behind’ featuring Alice Faye and Carmen Miranda distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: The Song of Bernadette cinema slide

Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.
